column2: The illustrations clearly point to a situation in which an exception to
the said general rule is  created.  That is  where a  situation in which a  third
person is  involved as a  victim.  It could be seen from the illustration (b)  to

column1: Section  67,  that  if  the  acts  of  offending  are  committed  in  respect  of  two
persons,  each  such  act,  although  similar

column2: punished separately. But such offending is in respect of one person, then, if
the  offender qualifies  himself under any of the  three  situations  identified

column1: as above, he is entitled to the concession under Section 67.
